hints.content:
Start at $110$ and count backwards by $1$'s.

When you get to $100$, go one more.

To go one more, find $100$ on the chart.

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c7fb0e9db775b0647f20a52345cf52dd.png)

What comes right before $100$ on the chart?

question.content:
**What whole number comes right before $100$? **  

 [[☃ input-number 1]]
